room_title: Escape room "The Bunker: Aftermath" by Escape Woods in Atlanta
review: Very different than the traditional escape room. The bunker rocks. Great set, friendly staff. Clues are well thought out.

room_title: Escape room "The Bunker: Aftermath" by Escape Woods in Atlanta
review: Escape Woods is definitely an off-the-beaten path escape room location. My friends and I did The Bunker room. It was not very difficult intellectually, but a great immersive and fun experience. Our gamemaster was also helpful and engaging.

room_title: Escape room "The Bunker: Aftermath" by Escape Woods in Atlanta
review: Me and a few friends did The Bunker: Aftermath yesterday and had such a good time! It was the first time I had ever done an escape room and it set the bar high!
